recipe.name: Vegetable Omelette
recipe.ingredients:
2 telur
1/2 cangkir tomat, potong dadu kecil
1/4 cangkir paprika, potong dadu kecil
1/4 cangkir bayam, cincang halus
1 sendok teh minyak zaitun
Garam dan merica secukupnya

recipe.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipe.ingredients:
1 cup rice
200g chicken breast, diced
1/2 cup broccoli
1/4 cup carrots, sliced
2 tbsp soy sauce
1 tbsp sesame oil
Salt and pepper to taste
recipe.cookingSteps: Cook rice according to package instructions. In a pan, heat sesame oil over medium heat. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add vegetables and soy sauce, cook until vegetables are tender. Serve over rice.

recipe.name: Overnight Oats
recipe.ingredients:
1 cup oats
1 cup almond milk
1 banana, sliced
1/4 cup almonds, chopped
1 tbsp honey
1 tsp cinnamon
recipe.cookingSteps: In a bowl, mix oats, almond milk, banana, almonds, honey, and cinnamon. Let it sit in the fridge overnight. In the morning, serve cold or heat in the microwave.

recipe.name: Penne Bolognese
recipe.ingredients:
200g penne pasta
1/2 cup marinara sauce
200g ground beef
1/4 cup onion, diced
1/4 cup bell pepper, diced
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
recipe.cookingSteps: Cook pasta according to package instructions. In a pan, brown ground beef with onion and bell pepper. Add marinara sauce and cooked pasta, stir until heated through. Serve with Parmesan cheese.

recipe.name: Turkey Avocado Sandwich
recipe.ingredients:
2 slices whole wheat bread
100g turkey breast
1/4 avocado, sliced
1/4 cup lettuce
1 tbsp mayonnaise
1 tsp mustard
Salt and pepper to taste
recipe.cookingSteps: Spread mayonnaise and mustard on bread slices. Layer turkey, avocado, and lettuce on one slice. Season with salt and pepper. Top with the other slice of bread. Slice in half and serve.
